title: Idris Elba is Knuckles in 'Sonic the Hedgehog 2' - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.11.21
description:
Janet and Blessing discuss Idris Elba cast as Knuckles, a BUNCH of indie games, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
Monday, Kinda Funny’s hosting the Marvel’s Avengers War for Wakanda Launch Party! Starting at 10 am PT over on twitch.tv/crystaldynamics, Greg and Ms. Marvel herself Sandra Saad (Sod) will be hosting two hours of gameplay, dev insight, and cast interviews. Yes, Black Panther himself Christopher Judge will be there, and you should, too! Monday at 10 am PT on twitch.tv/crystaldynamics!
Thank you to our Patreon Producer Black Jack.
The Roper Report   -
00:06:13 - Sonic the Hedgehog 2 casts Idris Elba as Knuckles - The Verge
00:22:19 - ID at Xbox Recap - Imran Khan at Fanbyte
00:37:25 -  Ad
00:38:45 - Nintendo Indie Showcase Recap - Fanbyte Imran Khan
00:47:45 - Niantic Founder’s metaverse fears - IGN Adam Bankhurst
00:55:15 - FIFA Shushing
00:58:00 - Life Is Strange Remastered Collection Delayed to 2022 Also Wavelengths DLC date
00:59:45 - Abandoned App Drama
01:02:00 - Out today
01:03:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Tim
